text: A continuum is when a change happens over time or an area without being interrupted. Space-time is when space and time are said to be part of the same continuum instead of two different continuums. A dialect continuum is a group of language dialects that change over an area. In a dialect continuum, two dialects are more different when they are farther away from each other. == Related pages == *Continuum (mathematics) Category:Philosophy of science
title: Continuum (theory)
